thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Equinix Qtrly Diluted Net Income Per Share $0.82

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Equinix Qtrly Diluted Net Income Per Share $0.82
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Equinix Inc:
* EQUINIX REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $1.204 BILLION TO $1.212 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 15 PERCENT * QTRLY REVENUE $1.2 BILLION VERSUS $942.6 MILLION * QTRLY DILUTED NET INCOME PER SHARE $0.82 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.17, REVENUE VIEW $1.19 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 AFFO INCREASE 14 PERCENT OVER THE PREVIOUS YEAR
* FOR FULL YEAR OF 2018, TOTAL REVENUES ARE EXPECTED TO EXCEED $5,010 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
